SA10nagvvy_u:1_0: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
SA10nagvvy_u:1_1: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayituṃ svabhāvam alam // NagVvy_01
SA10nagvvy_u:2_0: atha savabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hatā pratijñā te /
SA10nagvvy_u:2_1: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVvy_02
SA10nagvvy_u:3_0: mā śabdavad ity etat syāt te buddhir na caitad upapannam /
SA10nagvvy_u:3_1: śabdena hy atra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasya // NagVvy_03
SA10nagvvy_u:4_0: pratiṣedhapratiṣedho 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
SA10nagvvy_u:4_1: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṅato dūṣyate na mama // NagVvy_04
SA10nagvvy_u:5_0: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
SA10nagvvy_u:5_1: tan nāsti pratyakṣaṃ bhāvā yenopalabhyante // NagVvy_05
SA10nagvvy_u:7_1: kuśalaṃ janāḥ svabhāvaṃ śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ // NagVvy_07
SA10nagvvy_u:8_0: nairyāṇikasvabhāvo dharmā nairyāṇikāś ca ye teṣām /
SA10nagvvy_u:9_0: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ity evam /
SA10nagvvy_u:9_1: nāmāpi bhaven naivaṃ nāma hi nirvastukaṃ nāsti // NagVvy_09
SA10nagvvy_u:10_0: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:10_1: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭum // NagVvy_10
SA10nagvvy_u:11_0: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:11_1: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt // NagVvy_11
SA10nagvvy_u:12_0: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kiṃ nu pratiṣidhyate tvayānena /
SA10nagvvy_u:12_1: vacanenarte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ // NagVvy_12
SA10nagvvy_u:13_1: evaṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ syāt te pratiṣedhyato hy asataḥ // NagVvy_13
SA10nagvvy_u:14_0: nanv evaṃ saty asti grāho grāhyaṃ ca tadgrahītā ca /
SA10nagvvy_u:14_1: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat // NagVvy_14
SA10nagvvy_u:15_0: atha naivāsti grāho naiva grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:15_1: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro nanu sa santi // NagVvy_15
SA10nagvvy_u:15_2: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāraś ca yadyuta na santi /
SA10nagvvy_u:16_0: siddhā hi sarvabhāvās teṣam eva svabhāvaś ca // NagVvy_16
SA10nagvvy_u:17_0: hetoś ca te na siddhir naiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:17_1: nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya // NagVvy_17
SA10nagvvy_u:18_0: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
SA10nagvvy_u:19_0: atha hetor astitvaṃ bhāvāsvābhāvyam ity anupapannam /
SA10nagvvy_u:19_1: lokeṣu niḥsvabhāvo na hi kaś cana vidyate bhāvaḥ // NagVvy_19
SA10nagvvy_u:20_0: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam ity anupapannam /
SA10nagvvy_u:20_1: paścāc cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvaḥ san // NagVvy_20
SA10nagvvy_u:21_0: hetupratyayasāmagryāṃ ca pṛthak cāpi madvaco na yadi /
SA10nagvvy_u:21_1: manu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhāvānām asvabhāvatvāt // NagVvy_21
SA10nagvvy_u:22_0: yaś ca pratītyabhāvo bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti sā proktā /
SA10nagvvy_u:22_1: yaś pratītyabhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvam // NagVvy_22
SA10nagvvy_u:23_1: pratiṣedhayeta yadvat pratiṣedho 'yaṃ tathaiva syāt // NagVvy_23
SA10nagvvy_u:24_0: na svābhāvikam etad vākyaṃ tasmān na vādahānir me /
SA10nagvvy_u:24_1: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśeṣahetuś ca na nigadyaḥ // NagVvy_24
SA10nagvvy_u:25_0: mā śabdavad iti nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yas tvayā samārabdhaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:25_1: śabdena hi tac chabdasya vāraṇaṃ naivam etac ca // NagVvy_25
SA10nagvvy_u:26_0: naiḥsvābhāvyānāṃ cen naiḥsvābhāvyena vāraṇaṃ yadi hi /
SA10nagvvy_u:26_1: naiḥsvābhāvyanivṛttau svābhāvyaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ syāt // NagVvy_26
SA10nagvvy_u:27_0: atha vā nirmitakāyāṃ yathā striyāṃ strīyam ity asadgrāham /
SA10nagvvy_u:27_1: nirmitakaḥ pratihanyāt kasya cid evaṃ bhaved etat // NagVvy_27
SA10nagvvy_u:28_0: atha vā sādhyasamo 'yaṃ hetur na hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
SA10nagvvy_u:28_1: saṃvyavahāraṃ ca vayaṃ nānabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ // NagVvy_28
SA10nagvvy_u:29_0: yadi kā cana pratijñā syān me tata eṣa me bhaved doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:29_1: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmān naivāsti me doṣaḥ // NagVvy_29
SA10nagvvy_u:30_0: yadi kiṃ cid upalabheyaṃ pravartayeyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā /
SA10nagvvy_u:31_0: yadi ca pramāṇatas te teṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhir arthānām /
SA10nagvvy_u:31_1: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ te pramāṇānām // NagVvy_31
SA10nagvvy_u:32_0: anyair yadi pramāṇaiḥ pramāṇasiddhir bhavet tad anavasthā /
SA10nagvvy_u:32_1: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya // NagVvy_32
SA10nagvvy_u:33_0: teṣām atha pramāṇair vinā prasiddhir vihīyate vādaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:33_1: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVvy_33
SA10nagvvy_u:34_0: viṣamopanyāso 'yaṃ na hy ātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:34_1: na hi tasyānupalabdhir dṛṣṭā tamasīva kumbhasya // NagVvy_34
SA10nagvvy_u:35_0: yadi ca svātmānam ayaṃ tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:35_1: param iva nanv ātmānaṃ svaṃ paridhakṣyaty api hutāśaḥ // NagVvy_35
SA10nagvvy_u:36_0: yadi ca svaparātmānau tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:36_1: pracchādayiṣyati tamaḥ svaparātmānau hutāśa iva // NagVvy_36
SA10nagvvy_u:37_0: nāsti tamaś ca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhati parātmani jvalanaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:37_1: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo 'ndhakāravadhaḥ // NagVvy_37
SA10nagvvy_u:38_0: utpadyamāna eva prakāśayaty agnir ity asadvādaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:38_1: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ // NagVvy_38
SA10nagvvy_u:39_0: aprāpto 'pi jvalano yadi vā punar andhakāram upahanyāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:39_1: sarveṣu lokadhātuṣu tamo 'yam iha saṃsthito hanyāt // NagVvy_39
SA10nagvvy_u:40_0: yadi svataś ca pramāṇasiddhir anapekṣya tava prameyāṇi /
SA10nagvvy_u:40_1: bhavati pramāṇasiddhir na parāpekṣā svataḥsiddhiḥ // NagVvy_40
SA10nagvvy_u:41_0: anapekṣya hi prameyān arthān yadi te pramāṇasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvvy_u:41_1: na bhavanti kasya cid evam imāni tāni pramāṇāni // NagVvy_41
SA10nagvvy_u:42_0: atha matam apekṣya siddhis teṣām ity atra bhavati ko doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:42_1: siddhasya sādhanaṃ syān nāsiddho 'pekṣate hy anyat // NagVvy_42
SA10nagvvy_u:43_0: sidhyanti hi prameyāṇy apekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvvy_u:44_0: yadi ca prameyasiddhir nāpekṣyaiva bhavati pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvvy_u:44_1: kiṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yadarthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat // NagVvy_44
SA10nagvvy_u:45_0: atha tu pramāṇasiddhir bhavaty apekṣyaiva te prameyāṇi /
SA10nagvvy_u:45_1: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇām // NagVvy_45
SA10nagvvy_u:46_0: atha te pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā ca /
SA10nagvvy_u:46_1: bhavati pramāṇasiddhir nāsty ubhayasyāpi te siddhiḥ // NagVvy_46
SA10nagvvy_u:47_0: sidhyanti hi pramāṇair yadi prameyāṇi tāni tair eva /
SA10nagvvy_u:47_1: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVvy_47
SA10nagvvy_u:48_0: sidhyanti ca prameyair yadi pramāṇāni tāni tair eva /
SA10nagvvy_u:48_1: sādhyāni ca pramāṇais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVvy_48
SA10nagvvy_u:49_0: pitrā yady utpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
SA10nagvvy_u:49_1: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kam // NagVvy_49
SA10nagvvy_u:50_0: kaś ca pitā kaḥ putras tatra tvaṃ brūhi tāv ubhāv api ca /
SA10nagvvy_u:50_1: pitṛputralakṣaṇadharau yato bhavati no 'tra saṃdehaḥ // NagVvy_50
SA10nagvvy_u:51_0: naiva svataḥ prasiddhir na parasparataḥ parapramāṇair vā /
SA10nagvvy_u:51_1: na bhavati na ca prameyair na cāpy akasmāt pramāṇānāṃ // NagVvy_51
SA10nagvvy_u:52_1: kuśalaṃ svabhāvam evaṃ pravibhāgenābhidheyaḥ syāt // NagVvy_52
SA10nagvvy_u:53_0: yadi ca pratīya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10nagvvy_u:53_1: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati // NagVvy_53
SA10nagvvy_u:54_0: atha na pratītya kiṃ cit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10nagvvy_u:54_1: dharmāṇam evaṃ syād vāso na brahmacaryasya // NagVvy_54
SA10nagvvy_u:55_0: nādharmo dharmo vā saṃvyavahārāś ca laukikā na syuḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:55_1: nityāś ca sasvabhāvāḥ syur nityatvād ahetumataḥ // NagVvy_55
SA10nagvvy_u:56_0: evam akuśaleṣv avyākṛteṣu nairyāṇikādiṣu ca doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:56_1: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ te bhavaty eva // NagVvy_56
SA10nagvvy_u:57_0: yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāmātra brūyāt sasvabhāva ity evam /
SA10nagvvy_u:57_1: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaś ca na vayaṃ sat // NagVvy_57
SA10nagvvy_u:58_0: nāmāsad iti ca yad idaṃ tat kiṃ nu sato bhavaty utāpy asataḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:58_1: yadi hi sato yady asato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ // NagVvy_58
SA10nagvvy_u:59_1: sa upālambhas tasmād bhavaty ayaṃ cāpratijñāyāḥ // NagVvy_59
SA10nagvvy_u:60_0: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyata itīdam /
SA10nagvvy_u:60_1: āśaṅkitaṃ yad uktaṃ bhavaty anāśaṅkitaṃ tac ca // NagVvy_60
SA10nagvvy_u:61_0: sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanu prasiddham idam /
SA10nagvvy_u:61_1: pratiṣedhayate hi bhavān bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvam // NagVvy_61
SA10nagvvy_u:62_0: pratiṣedhayase 'tha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tac ca nāsti śūnyatvam /
SA10nagvvy_u:62_1: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanv eṣa vihīyate vādaḥ // NagVvy_62
SA10nagvvy_u:63_0: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiṃ cit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiṃ cit /
SA10nagvvy_u:63_1: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eṣa tvayā kriyate // NagVvy_63
SA10nagvvy_u:64_0: yac cāharte vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhavacanasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvvy_u:64_1: atra jñāpayate vāg asad iti tan na pratinihanti // NagVvy_64
SA10nagvvy_u:65_0: mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte yaḥ punar uktas tvayā mahāṃś carcaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:65_1: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ // NagVvy_65
SA10nagvvy_u:66_0: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syād grāho na syāt pratītya saṃbhūtaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:66_1: yaś ca pratītya bhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva // NagVvy_66
SA10nagvvy_u:67_0: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kas taṃ nivartayed grāham /
SA10nagvvy_u:67_1: śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viddhis tasmād eṣo 'nupālambhaḥ // NagVvy_67
SA10nagvvy_u:68_0: etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:69_0: yas traikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:70_0: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:70_1: prabhavati na tasya kiṃ cin na prabhavati śūnyatā yasya // NagVvy_70
SA10nagvvy_u:71_0: yaḥ śūnyatāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ ca /
SA10nagvvy_u:71_1: ekārthāṃ nijagāda praṇamāmi tam apratimabuddham // NagVvy_71
